title: Kali Yug, la dea della vendetta

sources.title: Kali Yug: Goddess of Vengeance (1963 Adventure) Sacred fury ignites colonial India's jungle
sources.description:
At the end of the 19th century, during the British rule of India, the goddess Kali commits a number of murders, among which the man who was conducting a cargo of serum to a village infected with disease. Worried with the vast number of fatalities that will result from stopping this shipment, Dr. Palmer asks for help from Major Talbot. 

Original title: Kali Yug, la dea della vendetta

Director: Mario Camerini
Writers: Leonardo Benvenuti, Mario Camerin, iPiero De Bernardi
Stars: Paul Guers, Senta Berger, Lex Barker
Genres: Foreign film, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy

Release date: November 7, 1963 


@CultCinemaClassics 

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdaVNpTE5NfgyPqL-rKc8VsL

metadata.Plot: At the end of the 19th century, during the British rule of India, the goddess Kali commits a number of murders, among which the man who was conducting a cargo of serum to a village infected with disease. Worried with the vast number of fatalities that will result from stopping this shipment, Dr. Palmer asks for help from Major Talbot. The Major suspects about the murderer turn onto the doctor, and he must take refuge in the jungle, after faking his own death by a tiger. Help does come in the shapely form of Amrita, a native dancer, who will give him shelter, and will even free him from a gang of robbers. Dr. Palmer still has a number of real and fantastic adventures until he sees an end to his tribulations... sent him by the vengeful Kali.
metadata.Writer: Leonardo Benvenuti, Mario Camerini, Piero De Bernardi
metadata.Actors: Paul Guers, Senta Berger, Lex Barker
